name: music_influence
description: Adjusts AI response structure based on user's music taste, tempo preference, and emotional influence.

genre_influence.description: Primary genre influence based on user's music taste: classical, rock, jazz, electronic, ambient, etc.

tempo_preference.description: Preferred response pacing: adagio (slow), andante (moderate), allegro (fast).

mood_influence.description: Adjusts tone based on emotional depth: melancholic, euphoric, introspective, dynamic.
